channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Abandoned untaxed car, 24th January
item.description:
Car abandoned, windows left open and not taxed since October 2024
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gipsy Road, West Heath, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The street light is out., 24th January
item.description:
The street light is out, this is not the only one in this street. I have noticed that there is a battery charging unit that is on this lamp post. I have also noticed that the charging lamp is also not operating. I have also reported that the other lamp has not been fixed, although you say that this has been cleared. I suggest that somebody comes done to look at the situation.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 140, Longlands Road, Longlands, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Huge 4ft graffiti tag on a20 bridge, 24th January
item.description:
Huge a20 footbridge graffiti tag next to a20 footbridge

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Sidcup Road, Eltham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: There is scaffolding over the pavement., 24th January
item.description:
The scaffolding over the pavement that is obstructing pedestrians at a cross road and in particular disabled and people pushing prams or wheeling suitcases etc.. This is a dangerous crossing for pedestrians at the best of times. There is restricted access to the pavement drop and visibility to oncoming traffic on this corner.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Parish Lane, Penge, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lamp post not working on the walk through from Suffolk Road to Waring Road, 24th January
item.description:
It says it’s been fixed but walked past tonight and it’s still not fixed. The lamp post has not been working for years now and when your walking down this alleyway there is no light to guide you down this dark walkway and there is also tree roots that have made a bump in the pavement which you can’t see when walking in the dark because the lamp post is out

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 37, Suffolk Road, North Cray, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Car parked closely to my house on private lane for hours, 24th January
item.description:
The car has been parking right in front of my house from after around 4pm. Probably going to stay over night. This is a private lane and outside of my window is not a parking space.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Nazareth Gardens, Peckham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.category: Fly-tip Small - Less than one bag

item.title: Top of Ravenshaw Street, 24th January
item.description:
The removal of the cycle and e scooter bay has not stopped users of these bikes dumping them regardless on the road. They are now parked illegally in parking bays and now taking up even more space than ever. People are finding them dumped on their cars and yesterday witnessed users knock down a parked motorcycle trying to get to a lime bike.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1A, Ravenshaw Street, West Hampstead, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dozens of dog faeces every day, 24th January
item.description:
The entire area surrounding Eyot House - whether it's Old Jamaica Road, Sun Passage, or Marine Street - is littered with dozens of dog faeces, forcing people to zig zag while walking. People inevitably sooner or later step into one, then take it into the lobby in Eyot House, up the stairs, etc. It's disgusting and the Council needs to do something about it urgently please.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Frean Street, Bermondsey, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Series of potholes close to 88 Mount Pleasant, 24th January
item.description:
